page.title: 06Trade:Lezant Shop
page.content:
{Lezant shop}has been open in our Parish for 130 years and owned by one family,the Sanders.Electricity was connected to the shop on the 9th August 1955 also Lezant shop used to have a thatched roof.Mrs.Sanders moved to Lezant when she was 14 and she still lives there after 74 years. The shop is in one room of a cottage.The thatched roof was taken off in 1955.They put new shelves in the shop but have made no other alterations to the house and shop.It opens on Sunday as well as all the other days of the week.She sells many things,but not frozen foods or vegetables.Milk and newspapers are delivered daily.
{* * * * *
